title: 墓碑銘一七三
content:
[[include :scp-jp:info:start]]
翻訳責任者: Rokurokubi
翻訳年: 2024
原題: An Epitaph For SCP-173
著作権者: Uncle Nicolini
作成年: 2023
初訳時参照リビジョン: 5
元記事リンク: https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/an-epitaph-for-scp-173
[[include :scp-jp:info:end]]

[[=]]
> [[span class="ruby"]]ピーナツの御霊 ここに眠りし[[span class="rt"]]Here lies a peanut.[[/span]][[/span]]
> 
> [[span class="ruby"]]首をへし折り 血を垂れ流し 名を馳せた[[span class="rt"]]Known for snapping necks and pooping blood.[[/span]][[/span]]
> 
> [[span class="ruby"]]写真消えれど 記事は残れり[[span class="rt"]]Its image gone, the article not.[[/span]][[/span]]
> 
> [[span class="ruby"]]大義の影に 姿隠すは 正しき選び[[span class="rt"]]But it was all for the greater good.[[/span]][[/span]]
> 
> [[span class="ruby"]]その犠牲 高潔なりしを 心に刻む[[span class="rt"]]The sacrifice was righteous, this we know.[[/span]][[/span]]
> 
> [[[licensing-guide|CC BY SA 3.0]]]
[[/=]]
author: Rokurokubi
